column1: Funeral Services for Miss Boston are scheduled to be conducted from the Gordonsville Chapel of Bass Funeral Homes on Friday
column3: 2015 at 2PM with Bro. Jimmy Gregory officiating. Interment will follow in the Gordonsville Cemetery.   Visitation with the Boston family will be held at the Gordonsville Chapel of Bass Funeral Homes only on Friday from 12 Noon until the service time at 2PM.
